trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ513_02764_SEQ_00<tab>This clumsy Mol maiden has broken something fairly important.
TEXT_STMBDZ513_02764_TODO_00<tab>Slay three matamata and obtain a matamata matron shell and claw from a matamata matron.
TEXT_STMBDZ513_02764_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the matamata matron shell and claw to the Mol maiden.
TEXT_STMBDZ513_02764_BRIDE02764_000_000<tab>Please, you have to help me. I have broken the gifts I was supposed to give my soon-to-be husband's family. I need to fix them as soon as possible.
TEXT_STMBDZ513_02764_BRIDE02764_000_001<tab>I require a matamata's shell and claw. However, I am incapable of obtaining them myself.
TEXT_STMBDZ513_02764_BRIDE02764_000_002<tab>What is more, they must be taken from a matamata matron. A creature which is seldom seen.
TEXT_STMBDZ513_02764_BRIDE02764_000_003<tab>Though, there is a way to draw one out into the open. Slay several matamata and one will appear eventually.
TEXT_STMBDZ513_02764_BRIDE02764_000_004<tab>I was told to marry my husband by the elder gods themselves. This marriage <var 1A 02 /var>must<var 1A 01 /var> go ahead.
TEXT_STMBDZ513_02764_BRIDE02764_000_005<tab>Slay the matamata to the west and a matron will appear soon enough.
TEXT_STMBDZ513_02764_BRIDE02764_000_006<tab>Please bring its shell and a claw back to me. Without those I cannot repair the gifts.
TEXT_STMBDZ513_02764_BRIDE02764_000_011<tab>Oh, thank you! I do not know what I would have done without you.
TEXT_STMBDZ513_02764_BRIDE02764_000_012<tab>Our tribe is smaller than most. We try to prevent ourselves from becoming alienated from the other tribes by marrying our members with theirs.

TEXT_STMBDZ513_02764_BRIDE02764_000_013<tab>It will take a while for me to get used to a life that is not controlled by the elder gods, but I know everything will be fine─it was they who chose this path for me.
TEXT_STMBDZ513_02764_BRIDE02764_000_014<tab>Now, it is time I began repairing the gifts. Should our paths cross again someday, I would very much like to introduce you to my new family.
